snippet: As of Jan. 1, diagnostic botanical descriptions may be written in Latin or English, and the electronic publication of new names is accepted.
abstract: Editorial applauds decision by biologists to write diagnostic botanical descriptions of plants in Latin or English, and to accept the electronic publication of new names of plants; argues that both changes will expand accessibility and speed up the descriptions of as yet undiscovered species.
lead_paragraph: As of Jan. 1, diagnostic botanical descriptions may be written in Latin or English, and the electronic publication of new names is accepted.
